text: I just started reading your new book and it's wonderful. Thank you SO much!
I'm so happy that people like you exist in the UK
Thank you for raising the issues with the education system at a national level. Everything you identify rings true
Thank you for sticking your head above the parapet. Your writing has been hugely supportive to us
As a Mum it felt so validating to hear the words 'parenting an emotionally sensitive child is hard work'

I spend years thinking I was a terrible parent, and feeling judged by all around when my son wouldn’t respond to traditional “punishment and reward” methods. But I didn’t know another way. Now I do – since being introduced to Low Demand Parenting my parenting is much more effective, my relationship with my son is repaired, my whole family is much happier and, most of all, I don’t feel like I’m failing him anymore.
I absolutely love your work and wanted to thank you :)
Your posts and descriptions of situations have taken away that struggle for me, word for word what you say fits everything I’m going through!
Every time I read one of your newsletters I want to shout “Hallelujah! Someone gets it!”
Thank you for your webinars which have helped in so many ways, not least in making us realize it isn't our parenting. It isn't the 'home problem ' school had told us it was.
Thank you for your free content. It is the first thing that made me feel heard and understood.
Your information is always spot on and I so wish you could travel round every single school in the country to open their eyes
I just wanted to say a big Thank You for all you are doing to help children and families everywhere. Especially those like mine, where there is PDA in the mix!
Yours are the first books and videos that have felt like they were made for us. I even managed to get my husband to watch your last video about school trauma.
Thanks Naomi, your posts are always equal parts comforting, educational and inspiring
I have such gratitude for what you are sharing
Because of you I feel like there is a light at the end of a dark tunnel
Thank you so very much for all you do, Naomi. There's a great deal of us who genuinely appreciate your wisdom and insight. All you share is incredibly impactful and is helping so many.
Naomi for MP! Go for it! Your country needs you!!
